jobInfo.jobName: 初级/中级全栈开发工程师
jobInfo.postDescription:
Junior/Mid Full-stack Development Engineer

Responsibilities:
•	Drive the definition and execution of project scope and expectations in collaboration with the Digital Services team.
•	Lead the development and ongoing maintenance of high-quality software solutions, implementing regular updates based on customer and company feedback.
•	Own and champion product quality, conducting rigorous testing and analysis of programs and products before launch.
•	Collaborate effectively within a team environment, demonstrating strong communication and interpersonal skills while also taking initiative and ownership of deadlines.
•	Foster a positive and productive work environment by maintaining open communication with supervisors and colleagues.
•	Apply meticulous attention to detail across all aspects of work, consistently exceeding expectations with quality-driven solutions.
Skills:
•	Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent experience with 2+ years of professional software development experience.
•	Proven track record of delivering robust and maintainable software solutions within deadlines and budget constraints.
•	Excellent oral and written communication skills capable of clearly articulating technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences.
•	Demonstrated ability to work effectively in a team environment while also taking initiative and ownership of tasks.
•	Solid understanding and practical experience with the software development lifecycle (SDLC) and web application development principles.
•	Expert proficiency in at least one of the following full-stack web frameworks (Ruby on Rails, Python Django and PHP Laravel).
•	Expert proficiency in front-skills: JavaScript, HTML, and CSS with a strong ability to build dynamic and user-friendly web interfaces.
•	In-depth experience with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and advanced query optimization techniques.
•	Knowledge of NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Redis, Elasticsearch) for specific data storage needs.
•	Good Command of both written and spoken English and Chinese
Bonus points:
•	Extensive experience with Ruby on Rails for server-side development.
•	Proficiency in a popular JavaScript framework (React, Vue, Angular) for building complex web applications.
•	Familiarity with Linux operating systems and command-line tools.
•	Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) for scalable and reliable deployments.
•	Understanding of Docker and CI/CD pipelines for automated build and deployment processes.
•	Ability to communicate in Cantonese is preferred

工作职责

1.	与公司的数字服务团队合作，推动项目落实和按照项目确认的方向执行和追踪。
2.	领导高质量软件解决方案的开发和持续维护，根据客户和公司反馈实施定期更新。
3.	维护并支持产品质量，在程序和产品发布之前进行严格的测试和分析。
4.	在团队环境中有效协作，展示强烈的沟通和人际交往能力，同时主动承担截止日期前的工作责任。
5.	通过与主管和同事保持开放的沟通，营造积极和富有成效的工作环境。
6.	在工作的各个方面都一丝不苟地注重细节，始终以质量驱动的解决方案来达至超出期望的结果。

要求

	计算机科学或相关专业的本科学历或以上; 具备 2 年以上的专业软件开发经验(如本身专业条件优秀者,也可放宽两年的专业开发经验要求.)
	具备在截止日期和预算限制内交付强大且可维护的软件解决方案的实际案例或工作经验。
	具备出色的口头和书面沟通技巧，能够向技术和非技术受众清楚地传达技术概念。
	在团队环境中有效工作的实际案例，并能对所承担任务呈现积极主动的态度。
	扎实理解并实践软件开发生命周期 (SDLC) 和 Web 应用程序开发原则。
	熟悉及掌握至少以下一个全栈 Web 框架 (Ruby on Rails、Python Django 和 PHP Laravel) 。
	前端技能专家：JavaScript、HTML 和 CSS，具有构建动态和用户友好的 Web 界面 的强大能力。
	深入了解关系数据库 (MySQL、PostgreSQL) 和高级查询优化技术。
	了解 NoSQL 数据库 (MongoDB、Redis、Elasticsearch) 以满足特定数据存储需求。
	良好的中英文书写和口语能力。

加分项:

	拥有使用 Ruby on Rails 进行服务器端开发的丰富经验。
	熟练掌握流行的 JavaScript 框架 (React、Vue、Angular) 来构建复杂的 Web 应用程序。
	熟悉 Linux 操作系统和命令行工具。
	拥有云平台 (AWS、Azure) 经验，可实现可扩展和可靠的部署。
	了解 Docker 和 CI/CD 管道，用于自动构建和部署流程。
	能以粤语进行沟通者优先考虑

brandComInfo.introduce: 一家在香港发展了十几年的香港本地著名食品餐饮连锁品牌。在香港目前拥有超过140家门店。在深圳注册成立的港资独资公司。
